section.note: Due to changing market factors, the following product and licensing information might change without notice. Please contact the DNN Sales Team for up-to-date information.

section.title: Overview
section.p:
For each edition of Evoq (Content or Engage), the following types of licenses are available:
Production licenses are for live sites.
Non-production licenses are intended for test sites and staging servers.
Development licenses are for local use (i.e., localhost).
Failover licenses are for emergency use only. Example, in case your main data center goes offline and you have to switch to a backup data center temporarily, the backup data center requires failover licenses.
section.note: To be able to get non-production, development, or failover licenses, you must have at least one paid commercial production license. Members of the DNN Partner Program can get not-for-retail (NFR) licenses without this requirement.

section.title: Activation
section.p: To activate a license, you need the invoice number(s) sent to you in an email after your purchase and the email address associated with each invoice. Each license will have its own invoice number (e.g., INV00x-1, INV00x-2, INV00x-3).

ul.li: For production licenses, see License Production Server.
For development licenses, see License Development Server.

section.p: You need one license activation for each IIS instance on each server.

By default, each production, non-production, and failover license can be activated only once. If you need to move a site to a different server or if a server crash or a database overwrite corrupts your site's license information, please open a customer support ticketto reactivate your existing license.
In contrast, a development license can be activated as many times as needed. To request additional activations for an existing development license, please open a customer support ticket.
section.note: If switching to a different development server, make sure that the old license is deleted before activating a new license on the new server.
